CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS(assignedPersonnel__r.Profile__c,"Solar"),"Solar", IF( CONTAINS(assignedPersonnel__r.Profile__c,"Water"),"Water", IF( CONTAINS(assignedPersonnel__r.Profile__c,"Window"),"Window", IF( CONTAINS(assignedPersonnel__r.Profile__c,"Automation"), "Home Automation", IF( CONTAINS(assignedPersonnel__r.Profile__c,"Pest"), "Pest Control","-")))))
CustomField.label: Affiliated Rep Industry
